column2: Luxury Two Story House for Sale - Piliyandala
column6: Solidly built two storied newly refurbished luxury house for sale in Piliyandala. Built on 10 Perches Land & approx 2,500 Sq Feet floor area. The house used all the highest quality materials to build, solid and wide brick walls, jack and teak timber, Rochelle and Lanka tiles, granite bench tops, Mahogany pantry cupboards.Nestled in a highly residential area yet adorned with peace and tranquillity and walking distance to both Maharagama and Kesbewa road and 2.5 km to the Piliyandala town, reach within minutes to Kesbewa-Piliyandala bypass and southern expressway. This fantastic luxury house boasts light, space and air offering prosperity, simplicity and peace for its residents. A perfect fit for families wanting to secure a modern yet simple quiet life, this extremely solid house offers hugely spacious 4 bedrooms, 2 high quality bathrooms ( one brand new), a servant quarters with a bathroom and a toilet, 1 store room, 2 large living rooms, a modern kitchen with mahogany cupboards and granite benchtops, a dining room with granite benchtop ( brand new) and mahogany cupboards (brand new), 3 balconies, teak staircase, and a back yard with separate washing and bathing facilities, both well and pipe born water, hot water system ( brand new), KTK brand ceiling fans. All timber in the house either jack and  teak. One existing garage, but an opportunity to build a double garage. The picturesque front garden is a wonderful setting for relaxation or entertaining with a metal swing for the kids to enjoy. The area presents a very good neighbourhood, professionals and educated people aspiring for quiet living.Inviting for simple, yet elegant living with low maintenance ensuring best value for money.Note :- Weekly garbage collection to the doorstep is available.

The entire house is very well ventilated with plenty of natural light coming in to the house through wide windows. There are two spacious living areas on the first floor and the second floor. There is a maid's toilet, small back yard and a large balcony with a view of the surrounding area. Additionally, all interior in the house (pantry cupboards, stair case, and ceiling) is built from Mahogany-wood and the exterior from Jack-wood (Doors and windows). It has a 1000L water tank and AKEA toilet fittings in all bathrooms.

column2: House for Sale Nugegoda
column6: HOUSE FOR SALEThis architect designed, solidly built and well maintained elegant house is located on the main Wijerama Road, Gangodawila, Nugegoda, just 2 minutes drive from the Wijerama Junction. It is within easy access to several banks, super markets, Sri Jayawardenepura University, Sri Jayawardenepura hospital etc.The house is located on a 20 perch block  of well drained, elevated land and is in a very good residential area. A high wall runs right round the property and its road side has a protective iron railing.The ground floor of the house consists of 2 living rooms; one large with fan and the other smaller air conditioned, dining, kitchen/pantry, visitors room (all with fans),  with attached bath room servants room with attached toilet & shower and garage. There is also an entrance veranda and a pleasant entry hall. Entire ground floor is tiled except the smaller sitting room which has a polished wooden floor.The upper floor ( laid with parquet wood except one tiled bed room) has 3air conditioned bed rooms with fans, a studio used as study and another studio serving as library room. Master bed room has attached bathroom with bath tub and ward robe. Other 2 bedrooms share a large bathroom also with bath tub. Upper floor has a roof terrace garden planted with Malaysian grass.Gardens and open court yards: The area between Wijerama road and the house has   a landscaped garden and paved access area to the house. The smaller sitting room opens to this garden which also  has several medium size trees ( 2 mango, 3 temple and several  other flowering trees. A side garden ( with a large temple tree & several palm trees) which opens to the main sitting room as well as to the rear side of the smaller sitting room. There are also 2 tiledinner court yards; the larger one opening to the main sitting and dining and the smaller one opening to the kitchen and dining. Both have large French style potswith decorative trees.Other features: include solar powered hot water in all bath rooms and kitchen; store room and workers toilet at the rear of the house; 3 phase electricity, SLT telephone connection and overhead water tank. The front pavedarea has space to park 4 cars. Entrance to the property is from an automatic/remote controlled gate and a manually operated side door. The gate area is monitored with an indoor monitor.Constructed in 1999Total plinth area: 2848 sq. ftPrice: Rs: 75 Mi.

column6: කොළඹ, පුවක්පිටිය, පඤ්ඤාසාර මාවතෙන් හයිලෙවල් පාරට සමීපව (මී.800) පර්චස් 18 ක ඉඩම සහ දෙමහල් නිවස විකිණීමට ඇත. පුවක්පිටිය නගරයට කිලෝමීටර 1.5 කි. අවිස්සාවේල්ල නගරයට මිනිත්තු 5 කින් ළඟාවිය හැකිය. ප්‍රාදේශීය ලේකම් කාර්යාලය, පුද්ගලික කර්මාන්තශාලා, ජනප්‍රිය පාසල්, බැංකු, පොලිස් ස්ථානය, වෙළඳ පොල, පුඩ් සිටි, ඉන්ධන පිරවුම්හල් ආදී ස්ථානවලට ද ආසන්නව මෙම ස්ථානය පිහිටා ඇත. එමෙන්ම සීතාවක කර්මාන්ත පුරයට, රජයේ සහ පුද්ගලික රෝහල් (ගෝමස්, වීනස්, කැළණිවැලි (පුද්) රෝහල), දුම්රිය ස්ථානයට (කි.මී.3) ආසන්නය. වර්ග අඩි 2800 පමණ නිවස නිදන කාමර 5, සාලය, කෑම කාමරය, මුළුතැන්ගෙය, පැන්ට්‍රිය, නානකාමර 3, වැසිකිළිය වෙනමම පිවිසුම් සහිත ඇනෙක්සි 2, වට තාප්පය සහ ගේට්ටුවකින් සමන්විතයි. ළිං / නල ජලය, විදුලිය හා දුරකථන, ගමනා ගමන පහසුකම් ආදී යටිතල පහසුකම් වලින් ද යුක්තයි. බැංකු ණය පහසුකම් ලබාගත හැකි සින්නක්කර ඔප්පු සහිතයි. ස්වභාවික විපත් වලින් තොර ස්ථානයකි. පදිංචියට සුදුසුම ස්ථානයකි. සියළු පහසුකම් සහිත නිස්කලංක මනරම් වටපිටාවක් සහිතයි. ඉක්මනින් විකිණේ.
